New Records: Argentina won a record 16th Copa América title
Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored the winning goal in extra time
Pre-Game Insights: The match started over 75 minutes late due to crowd trouble at Hard Rock Stadium
Post-Match Reflections: Angel Di Maria said he dreamed of retiring after winning the title
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win marked Angel Di Maria's final Argentina match
Others: Crowd control issues outside the stadium caused delays and security breaches
